name: Line Jump (itch)
description:
Go on a journey:

  • Flip and jump to dodge approaching obstacles!
  • Increase your score multiplier every flip!
  • A collision will reset the multiplier!

Go on an adventure:

  • There are three different jump heights available!
  • Use the correct combination of jumps to make it as far as possible!
  • Increase your score multiplier every clean landing!
  • A collision will reset the multiplier!

Controls:

  • Journey: Left Arrow: Flip | Down Arrow: Jump
  • Adventure: Left Arrow: Jump 1 | Down Arrow: Jump 2 | Right Arrow: Jump 3
  • Controls can be flipped if you  want!

Credits:

  • Developer:   https://shaboomhan.itch.io/
  • Music: EvilMind

Android release coming soon!
